value: Your ticket has been automatically closed due to inactivity

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, This is a reminder that we have not heard from you on your pending issue with Dynatrace for {{ticket.organization.custom_fields.account_name}} # {{ticket.id}}. Because of this, your issue is now set to solved. Please know that you will have seven days to reply and re-open this ticket. If you do not reply within 7 days, this ticket will be closed. Thank you for contacting Dynatrace ONE. Best, {{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

automations.title: Request customer satisfaction rating (system automation) - Full Comments

value: Request #{{ticket.id}}: How would you rate the support you received?

Hello {{ticket.requester.name}},

Thank you for your patience as we worked your ticket. We now believe it has been solved.

You have seven days to reply to this ticket to reopen it. If you do not reply within seven days, it will be closed.

We would also love to hear what you think of your experience with your Dynatrace ONE expert working this ticket. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking either link below:

{{satisfaction.rating_section}}

Here's a reminder of what this request was about:

{{ticket.comments_formatted}}

Thank you for contacting Dynatrace ONE!

value:
Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}}, we have not heard from you for 24 hours. If there is no update to the conversation https://{{ticket.url}} in the next 24 hours, the conversation will be closed. If this problem persists or you have any additional questions, you can re-open this conversation for up to 7 days. 

Thank you for contacting us.
